sense.def:
Izraz
however
uporabimo, kadar pristavimo nekaj, kar je v nasprotju s pravkar povedanim.

seg.quote: Losing at games doesn't matter to some women. Most men, however, can't stand it.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
however
poudarimo, da stopnja ali obseg nečesa ne more spremeniti določenih okoliščin.

seg.quote: She could not remember, however hard she tried.

sense.def:
Izraz
however many
ali
however much
postavimo za besedo
or
na začetku stavka, če želimo povedati, da ne poznamo točne količine ali velikosti nečesa in da to ni pomembno;

seg.quote: ...the twelve or eleven people on the jury or however many there are.
